title: Paris, je t'aime
description:
Through the neighborhoods of Paris, love is veiled, revealed, imitated, sucked dry, reinvented and awakened.

Paris, je t'aime (Paris, I love you) is a 2006 anthology film starring an ensemble castof actors of various nationalities.

title: Guys' Bible Discussion
description: This is a time for guys-only discussion! Man-to-man time and man-to-man talk. We are reading the book of Acts every week, and will get dinner together in D2 afterward. Bring yourself and your friends along!

title: Girls' Bible Discussion
description: A weekly Bible reading and discussion of the Book of Hebrews open to all female students. Join us for a time of fellowship over dinner afterwards.

title: Appreciation Day Baking
description: Join us and show your appreciation to our staff by helping bake and decorate delicious cupcakes and cookies for them!

title: Large Group Bible Discussion
description:
We are studying the Book of Matthew from the New Testament this semester! Come join us for a time of discussion - anyone is welcome :)

We also usually get dinner right after the discussion, so please do join us for that, even if you can't make the discussion.

title: Spacious Wednesday
description: This is our weekly guided meditation sessions.

title: Love Local Madinat Zayed Trip
location: Madinat Zayed Shopping Center, Abu Dhabi, UAE
description: Madinat Zayed is a mall unique among others in Abu Dhabi and with the move to Saadiyat we felt that the NYUAD community is beginning to lose touch with the mall and the neighborhood that surrounds it. So to introduce the younger generation of students to the unique handicrafts, custom textiles (at student friendly prices), and 1 dirham chai we've planned a shopping tour of the Madinat Zayed mall.

title: Korean Movie Night
description: There will be another movie screening hosted by Dongari. The movie, 태극기를 휘날리며 (Taegeukgi, The Korean National Flag), represents the tragedies of war as it portrays a touching story of two brothers during the Korean War.

title: Stalker
description:
A guide leads two men through an area known as the Zone to find a room that grants wishes.

Directed by Andrei Tarkovsky, Stalker has been called one of the best drama films of the latter half of the 20th century.

title: Pakistani Mock Wedding 4.0
description: Continuing the tradition, Pakistan Student Association brings to you the fourth edition of Mock Wedding, an event that depicts the traditions of the typical Pakistani wedding. Its an evening filled with dances, loud music, rituals, Pakistani food and colorful clothes that highlights the centerpiece of Pakistani tradition and culture. The Mock Wedding is a unique and exciting event where members of the NYUAD family can get together to experience the mock union of two members of the student body.

title: Dunkirk
description:
Allied soldiers from Belgium, the British Empire and France are surrounded by the German Army, and evacuated during a fierce battle in World War II.

 Dunkirk received praise for its screenplay, direction, musical score, and cinematography; some critics called it Nolan's best work, and one of the greatest war films.

title: The Umbrellas of Cherbourg
description:
A young woman separated from her lover by war faces a life-altering decision.

The Umbrellas of Cherbourg  was nominated for several Academy Awards, including for Best Foreign Film, Best Song, Best Soundtrack, and Best Original Screenplay. It won three awards at the 1964 Cannes Film Festival, including its top prize, the Palme D'or.

title: Chinese Take-Away
description: Chinese Take-Away (Spanish: Un cuento chino) is a 2011 Argentine comedy film written and directed by Sebastián Borensztein. The film was the highest grossing non-US film in Argentina in 2011.

title: Love Local - Abu Dhabi Secrets Tour
description: Come join us to discover some of our favorite Abu Dhabi attractions; we've planned a half-day shopping trip throughout the city's markets to introduce you to some smaller local outlets within the city so that, next time, you don't have to do all your shopping at LuLu's.  We'll leave for the fruit and carpet souks around 10 am and then head into port to stop at the Iranian markets.  Next, we'll visit Madinat Zayed and afterwards, you'll get a huge lunch (on us) at one of our favorite restaurants in the the city before returning back to campus by 2:00.

title: Paradise Now
description:
Two childhood friends are recruited for a suicide bombing in Tel Aviv.

Paradise Now won a Golden Globe for best foreign language film and was nominated for an Academy Award in the same category.

title: Trip to Korean Culture Center in Abu Dhabi
description: Dongari is hosting a trip to Korean Culture Center in Abu Dhabi. We will take a shuttle bus together to go and enjoy a wide variety of Korean culture!
